name: Nakayama Miho no Tokimeki High School
name_original: Nakayama Miho no Tokimeki High School
description:
Nakayama Miho no Tokimeki High School is an adventure game developed by Square. It was originally released in 1987.
Nakayama Miho no Tokimeki High School is available on NES.
It was scored by Nobuo Uematsu and Toshiaki Imai.
